title: Jalisco’s Winter Flu Vaccination Drive Includes COVID-19 Vaccines
description: Puerto Vallarta's winter vaccination campaign is now underway, offering free influenza and updated COVID-19 vaccines from Moderna and Pfizer. The program aims to protect older adults, healthcare workers, pregnant women, and those with chronic illnesses from severe illness this cold season.

title: Influenza-like illnesses: What is it and how to avoid it
description: Some Filipinos are experiencing fear and anxiety as social media is buzzing about the recent increase in influenza-like illnesses (ILIs) in the country. However, what is an ILI and what does it mean?
